ActFinancial Administration Act
PrecisApproval of the appointment by the Minister of Transport of JONATHAN SCOTT of Bradford West Gwillimbury, Ontario, to be a director of the board of directors of VIA Rail Canada Inc., to hold office during pleasure for a term of four years.
